properties.entry: SELECT PARAM_VALUE FROM KYC_PARAMETERS WHERE PARAM_KEY='KYC_POSTAL_CODE_VERSION'
SELECT POSTAL_CODE, ID_CITY, CITY, ID_STATE, STATE FROM KYC_POSTAL_CODES_CENTRAL WHERE VERSION = ? AND POSTAL_CODE=?
SELECT ID_NEIGHBORHOOD, NEIGHBORHOOD FROM KYC_POSTAL_CODES_NEIGHBORHOOD WHERE RELATED_VERSION=? AND RELATED_POSTAL_CODE=?
